ada wana wita ape rate siyalu nagarawala palathwala wegawath sanwardhanayak siduwana bawath ee atharama in thawath ekak wana mema nagoda sita narthupana dakwa wu margaya sanwardhanayen pasu thamunnanselage mema pradeshaye dawantha sanwardhanayak siduwana bawath janadhipathithumata mewan sanwardhanayak udesa himiwana pranamaya mema margaya pululkota sanwardhanaya kara dimedith esema himiwiya yuthu wena bawath waraya ha maha marga wyapruthi amathya nirmala kothalawala mahatha pawasiya.ee mahatha ese pawasuwe nagoda sita kiwulawaththa ‚Äì bombuwala thebuwana nagaraya haraha narthupana dakwa wihida yana margaya pululkota kapat athura sanwardhanaya kirime katayuthu aarambha kirima sankethawath kirima sandaha wu bombuwala pansala mankada nagara madhyaye pawathi jana hamuwedi ya.bombuwala - gamada kaluthara baddata ayath wana bawath janadhipathithuma kerehi bombuwala delos dahasak pamana wu chanda dayakayange wishwasaya adath randa pawathna bawath pawasu amathiwaraya pera pawathi wakawanuwakadi ewakata mathugama aasanaye manthriwarayaku washayen sitiya ‚Äúanil munasinha‚Äù mahatha mema margaya pululkota sanwardhanaya kara dima salasumkara siti namuth yam yam karunu karana matha eya itukara ganimata nohakiwi giya bawath pawasiya.mema sanwardhana kriyadamayedi prawahana amathi kumara welgama mahatha pradhana disthrikkaye siyalu amathyawarunge sahayogaya kapawima thamata labena bawath margaya depasa padinchikaruwan wyaparikayan athulu samadenage sahayogaya laba dena lesata illa sitina bawada pawasiya.janadhipathithumange sankalpayak matha kethhena mansandhiye sita bandaragamata piwisiya haki paridi palam marga athulathwa nawa margayak idikirime awadhanayak yomuwi athi bawada wadiduratath pawasiya.bombuwala shri subodhirajarama maha wiharadhipathi shasthrapathi halwathure assaji nahimiyan adahas dakwamin:eda sudu adhirajyawadin kaluthota (kaluthara) sita thebuwanata yana ashwakaraththa gamankara aththe mema margaye bawa pothapathe sandahanwa athi bawath mahamarga paddhathiya yatathe wu bi shrenigatha pradhana washayen sanwardhanaya wana margayak washayen digin kilo mitar 18 k durata wihida yana mema margaya sanwardhanaya kirimata ida salasa dima nirmala kothalawala amathithumagen wu udara sewawak bawath pawasiya.mema margaya sanwardhanaya sandaha miliyana 1600 k pamana mudalak wayawana bawada, digin kilo mitar 18 wana bawada, wideshiya naya dharithawakin thorawa deshiya wiyadamin thana nima kirimata marga sanwardhana adhikariya sampurna wagakima bharagena athi bawada adhyaksha dabliw.
